original: Boman, Harald, direktör, Göteborg, f. 17/8/99 i Gbg av med. lic. Herman B. o. Elin Ekblom. G. 36 m. Karin Edwall. Barn: Margareta f. 37, Christer 42, Eva 43, Inger 47. — Studiex. 17, utex. fr. Gbgs hand :inst. 18. Anst. v. SKF i Gbg 19, v. SKF bok i Latinamerika 21-22, v. isamma bol. i Japan o. Kina 24-29, chef^ f. SKF indisika bol. 30-33, försäljn xhef f. SKF-koncernen 37, dir. i bok 41. Led. av istyr. f. A-B Sukab i Sthlm o. fl. av SKF dotter-bol.
translated: Boman, Harald, director, Gothenburg, b. August 17, 1899 in Gothenburg to medical licentiate Herman B. and Elin Ekblom. Married in 1936 to Karin Edwall. Children: Margareta b. 1937, Christer b. 1942, Eva b. 1943, Inger b. 1947. Completed his studies in 1917 and graduated from Gothenburg's School of Business in 1918. Employed by SKF in Gothenburg in 1919, worked for SKF's subsidiary in Latin America from 1921-1922, worked for the same company in Japan and China from 1924-1929, managed SKF's Indian subsidiary from 1930-1933, was sales director for the SKF Group in 1937, and became a director in 1941. He served on the board of directors for A-B Sukab in Stockholm, and of several SKF subsidiary companies.

worksFor.name: SKF's subsidiary in Japan and China
